nodes.text: Rescue from Jabba's Palace  (5-Minute Star Wars Stories)
"Rescue from Jabba's Palace" is a short story published in 5-Minute Star Wars Stories. It adapts the film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.
The story re-used illustrations previously done by Pilot Studio in the 2015 book Rescue from Jabba's Palace by Michael Siglain, with additional text written by Brooke Dworkin.
